metrics_conclusion: Nasty has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Nasty is written in the key of F♯ Locrian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 9th most popular key among Locrian keys and     the 81st most popular  among all keys. The F♯ Locrian scale is similar to the F♯ Minor scale except that both the 2nd and the 5th notes (G and C) are a half step lower.  This means that the characteristic "home base" chord of F♯ Locrian has a dissonant diminished quality (f#˚), which makes it a very uncommon choice for songs.

See the F♯ Locrian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
